titleStmt.title: A proposal for supplying His Majesty with twelve hundred thousand pounds, by mending the coin, and yet preserve the ancient standard of the kingdom. / By a Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: L. R., gentleman.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by John Whitlock near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Glasgow University Library.
